discordnotifications-block: Used as link text of the button that will (when clicked) block the user of the notifications.
discordnotifications-groups: Used as link text of the button .
discordnotifications-talk: Used as link text of the button.
discordnotifications-contribs: Used as link text of the button.
discordnotifications-centralauth: Used as link text of the button.
discordnotifications-edit: Used as link text of the button.
discordnotifications-delete:
Used as link text of the button.

{{Identical|Delete}}
discordnotifications-history: Used as link text of the button.
discordnotifications-diff: Used as link text of the button.
discordnotifications-preview: Used as link text of the button.
discordnotifications-bytes: Unit for size of a file
discordnotifications-article-saved:
A notification text for when a user edits a page

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - action
* $3 - article
* $4 - summary
discordnotifications-article-created:
A notification text for when a user creates a page

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - article
* $3 - summary
discordnotifications-article-deleted:
A notification text for when a user deletes a page

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - article
* $3 - reason
discordnotifications-article-undeleted:
A notification text for when a user undeletes a page

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - article
* $3 - reason
discordnotifications-article-moved:
A notification text for when a user moves a page

In RTL languages, use â¬….

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - previous title of the article
* $3 - new title of the article
* $4 - reason
discordnotifications-article-protected:
A notification text for when a user protects a page

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - action
* $3 - article
* $4 - reason
discordnotifications-new-user:
A notification text for when a user account is created

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - extra messages
discordnotifications-file-uploaded:
A notification text for when a user uploads a file

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - url of the file
* $3 - filename
* $4 - mime type
* $5 - size
* $6 - unit for size
* $7 - description
discordnotifications-block-user:
A notification text for when a user blocks another user

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - target
* $3 - reason
* $4 - expiry
* $5 - link for list of all blocks
discordnotifications-block-user-reason: Clause for reason of a block notification
discordnotifications-block-user-list: Used as link text of the button for list of all blocks
discordnotifications-view-user-rights: Used as link text of the button for Viewing or managing user rights
discordnotifications-change-user-groups:
A notification text for when a user changes another user's groups

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - target
* $3 - new groups
discordnotifications-change-user-groups-:
A notification text for when a user changes another user's groups

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - target
* $3 - old groups
* $4 - new groups
discordnotifications-moderation-pending:
A notification text for when a user submits an edit to the moderation queue

Parameters:
* $1 - the username
* $2 - page
* $3 - link to the moderation queue
